title: The Great AI Chatbot Challenge: ChatGPT vs. Gemini vs. Copilot vs. Perplexi
excerpt: We tested OpenAI’s ChatGPT against Microsoft’s Copilot and Google’s Gemini, along with Perplexity and Anthropic’s Claude. Here’s how they ranked.

title: Claude vs ChatGPT: A Comparison of AI Chatbots
excerpt: Claude and ChatGPT are two compelling options in AI chatbots, each with unique features and capabilities. To discern their strengths and suitability for various applications, let's compare these two AI chatbots comprehensively. What is Claude? Claude is an AI chatbot developed by an Anthropic AI renowned for its ability to simulate human-like conversations. Built on sophisticated NLP algorithms, Claude excels in engaging users in meaningful dialogues across a spectrum of topics. What sets Claude apart is its emphasis on understanding the user's persona and tailoring responses to match individual preferences and communication styles. title: Innovative three-year-olds expose the limits of AI chatbots
excerpt: New experiments show that very young children are better at solving creative puzzles than ChatGPT and other AI models
